Detalhes da amostra #value
Arsenic - Dissolved
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments
Acute Poisoning: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea and death Chronic Effects: Cancer, skin leasions, neurological effects, cardiovascular issues, diabetes and respiratory problems
In order to remove Arsenic from the water one must use dystilation, activated alumina or reversed osmosis.
Arsenic - Total
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments
Acute Poisoning: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea and death Chronic Effects: Cancer, skin leasions, neurological effects, cardiovascular issues, diabetes and respiratory problems
In order to remove Arsenic from the water one must use dystilation, activated alumina or reversed osmosis.
Cadmium - Dissolved
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments

Acute Poisoning: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, respiratory distress and death. Chronic Effects: Kidney damage, bone damage, cardiolascular issues, respiratory problems, cancer, reproductive and developmental effects.
In order to remove Cadmium from the water one must use activated carbon filtration, reversed osmosis and ion exchange.
Cadmium - Total
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments

Acute Poisoning: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, respiratory distress and death. Chronic Effects: Kidney damage, bone damage, cardiolascular issues, respiratory problems, cancer, reproductive and developmental effects.
In order to remove Cadmium from the water one must use activated carbon filtration, reversed osmosis and ion exchange.
Cyanide- Total
It is strongly advised to keep away from any Cyanide contaminated water.

Acute Poisoning: Rapid breathing, rapid herat rate, nausea, vomiting, headache, confusion, dizziness, seizures, respiratory distress, cardiovascular effects, coma and death. Chronic Effects: Neurological impairment and cardiac damage.
No treatment available. Report to authoraties.
Chromium - Dissolved
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments
Acute Poisoning: Respiratory effects, gastrointestinal effects and skin irritation. Chronic Effects: Cancer and respiratory effects.
In order to remove Chromium from the water one must use specialized filters, ion exchange and reversed osmosis.
Chromium - Total
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments
Acute Poisoning: Respiratory effects, gastrointestinal effects and skin irritation. Chronic Effects: Cancer and respiratory effects.
In order to remove Chromium from the water one must use specialized filters, ion exchange and reversed osmosis.
Chromium - Hexavalent
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments
Acute Poisoning: Respiratory effects, gastrointestinal effects and skin irritation. Chronic Effects: Cancer and respiratory effects.
In order to remove Chromium from the water one must use specialized filters, ion exchange and reversed osmosis.
Dieldrin
It is strongly advised to keep away from any Dieldrin contaminated water.

Acute Poisoning: Dizziness, headache, conffusion, seizures, nausea, vomiting, diaherrea and skin irritation. Chronic Effects: Seizures, cognitive deficits, fertility problems, cancer, immune system problems, liver and kidney harm.
No treatment available. Report to authoraties.
Endrin
It is strongly advised to keep away from any Endrin contaminated water.

Acute Poisoning: Dizziness, headache, conffusion, seizures, nausea, vomiting, diaherrea and skin irritation. Chronic Effects: Seizures, cognitive deficits, fertility problems, cancer, immune system problems, liver and kidney harm.
No treatment available. Report to authoraties.
Fecal Coliform
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments. Avoid skin contact.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, fever, dehydration, accute gastrointeritis and infectious diseases. Chronic Effects: Recurrent infections, comprimised immune system, irritable bowel and inflammatory bowel disease.
In order ro remove Fecal Coliform from the water one must boil for 1 minute, use purification tablets, chlorine and water filters.
Fecal Coliform
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments. Avoid skin contact.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, fever, dehydration, accute gastrointeritis and infectious diseases. Chronic Effects: Recurrent infections, comprimised immune system, irritable bowel and inflammatory bowel disease.
In order ro remove Fecal Streptococci from the water one must boil for 1 minute, use purification tablets, chlorine and water filters.
Mercury - Dissolved
It is strongly advised to keep away from any Mercury contaminated water.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, headache, muscle weakness, chest pain, coughing, respiratory distress, skin irritation and rashes. Chronic Effects: Memory problems, coordination issues, muscle atrophy, vision disturbances, elevated blood pressure, heart disease, kidney damage, impared cognitive and motor skilss, depression, anxiety and gum inflammation.
No treatment available. Report to authoraties.
Mercury - Total
It is strongly advised to keep away from any Mercury contaminated water.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, headache, muscle weakness, chest pain, coughing, respiratory distress, skin irritation and rashes. Chronic Effects: Memory problems, coordination issues, muscle atrophy, vision disturbances, elevated blood pressure, heart disease, kidney damage, impared cognitive and motor skilss, depression, anxiety and gum inflammation.
No treatment available. Report to authoraties.
Dissolved Oxygen
High levels of dissolved O2 in the water may be caused by polution
Lead Dissolved
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments. Avoid skin contact.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting and irritavility fatigue. Chronic Effects: Impared cognitive and motor skilss, memory difficulties, muscle weakness, abdominal pain, high blood pressure, heart disease, kidney damage and immune system effects.
In order ro remove Lead from the water one must use specific filter for Lead removing filters and reverse osmosis.
Lead Total
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments. Avoid skin contact.

Acute Poisoning: Diarrhea, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting and irritavility fatigue. Chronic Effects: Impared cognitive and motor skilss, memory difficulties, muscle weakness, abdominal pain, high blood pressure, heart disease, kidney damage and immune system effects.
In order ro remove Lead from the water one must use specific filter for Lead removing filters and reverse osmosis.
Turbidity
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments. Turbidity may be an indicator of water pollution
pH+
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments.
Acute Poisoning: Abdominal and ingestion discomfort. Chronic Effects: Metabolic aucaloses.
In order to treat this water one must add sulfuric acid, hydrochloric acid and carbon dioxide.
pH-
It is strongly advised against drinking or cooking with this water without proper treatments.
Acute Poisoning: Abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Chronic Effects: Dental errosion and metabolic acidoses.
In order to treat this water one must add sodium carbonate, sodium hydroxide and potassium hydroxide.
